short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blurs the body when clicked for all websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- With a single click you can blur the whole web page. 
- Has slider as well to change the level of blur
- Useful for designers to try the squint test to check visual hierarchy of the web page
- Opensource hence privacy respecting
